headline: Pentair stock downgraded on consumer spending slowdown, housing weakness
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America downgraded Pentair (NYSE:PNR) to Underperform from Neutral, saying the company’s exposure to softening consumer spending and residential construction could weigh on earnings and investor sentiment through 2025.
